title: Pan T Cells isolated from mononuclear cells of a healthy donor
summary: Pan T cells isolated from mononuclear cells of a healthy donor (same donor as t_3k). T cells are primary cells with relatively small amounts of RNA (~1pg RNA/cell).   Used Chromium v2 chemistry and Cell Ranger 1.3.0 software. 4,518 cells detected. Sequenced on Illumina Hiseq4000 with approximately 73,000 reads per cell
